comment:
REVIEW: CR-095 v0.1 — COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Attachment Auto-Close + VR Template/Compiler Refinements" — present, non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-002 Section 8

STRUCTURE (SOP-002 Section 6):
All 12 required sections present: Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, Execution, Execution Summary, References.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT:
No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9, 12). Editable fields in Sections 10-11 contain expected execution-phase templates per SOP-004 Section 4.2.

TRACEABILITY:
- SOP-004 Section 9C.2 claim verified: "closed when parent document closes" confirmed in SOP-004 VR Lifecycle workflow
- References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006, CR-094 — all valid
- Parent Document: None (independent improvement) — appropriate

TECHNICAL ASSESSMENT:
Theme A (Attachment Lifecycle): Sound generic approach. attachment flag provides extensibility. Terminal state checkout guard closes a gap against SOP-001 Section 8.3. Cascade close implements SOP-004 9C.2 mandate. Auto-compile before cascade close prevents data loss for checked-out interactive documents.

Theme B (Template/Compiler): Template v5 changes well-itemized. Removing Signature/References sections aligns with SOP-004 9C.2 (no independent approval cycle). Auto-metadata, block rendering, attribution placement, and step subsection numbering are clearly specified.

BUNDLING: Both themes affect qms-cli. Logical grouping — Theme A implements lifecycle integration, Theme B improves output quality for the same document type. Reasonable scope.

IMPACT ASSESSMENT: Files Affected, Documents Affected, Development Controls, and Qualified State Continuity all complete. Six new requirements identified for SDLC-QMS-RS/RTM.

EI TABLE: 12 items. EI-1 and EI-12 satisfy SOP-004 Section 5 pre/post-execution commit requirements. EI-6 flagged for VR (integration verification). Structure aligns with implementation plan phases.

FORMATTING: No typos, consistent section numbering, consistent table formatting, consistent horizontal rules.
